com.attivio.sdk.search

Class SearchField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.sdk.search.SearchField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<SearchFieldValue>

    public class SearchField
extends Object
implements Iterable<SearchFieldValue>, Externalizable, Cloneable
    A list of field values for a SearchDocument.
    See Also:
